attributes.action: Provide more help to young drivers in Full Time Eductaion to pay for insuring or running their vehicle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The young drivers of today suffer heavy blows when paying for car insurance. Currently the average per month (Using statistics I collected) for male drivers aged 17-18 is £240 a Month. Along with running costs of petrol and general wear of the vehicle. This comes as a very hard to manage situation. If the person is in full time education, as I have found myself, It is very hard to manage that, plus your out of college work plus work to pay for the running of the vehicle. I myself pay £275 per month on a 1.2 litre unmodified car. Working on the same basis as EMA but used solely for the running of a car I think help needs to be implemented as it puts a lot of stress on the youth.
